message:
Hi all
Do you know how to convert Sqlite script to SQL script?! :(
Is there any tool?

data.message:
Well, I'm not sure if I know something that can do this for you .. but why not using PHP (PDO) since that it has a unified database API and it is easy to switch from a database driver to another ?!

I hope that this reply was of help to you :)

thnx for your reply, but i think there is something that i missed to say :)
I am a Microsoft Developer and don't know PHP :(
khaled .. AFAIK, sqlite uses a standard sql 92 statements .. so actually you don't need to convert anything !!!

something like
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO
or like
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO
i don't know what is the equivalent in SQL
You can run the script on SQL and check if there is any errors?
